LanguageData.DarkProd.label: Matter Converter
LanguageData.DarkProd.description: A large machine with the capabilities of using fission to produce energy and form that energy into dark energy, which is required to make dark matter.
LanguageData.GodTable.label: Forge
LanguageData.GodTable.description: A workbench with the capabilities of allowing pawns to wield the power of death in their hands. Can work without electricity at 25% of normal speed.
